Docs.param: JavaScript source to be executed to obtain a list of proxies to use.
Docs.summary: Executes the provided javascript source to determine a list of proxies to use for connecting to the target URL.
Docs.returns: Returns an array of objects suitable to use for connecting to .
Docs.remarks: This method serves as a convenience wrapper for .

Docs.summary: Gets a custom suitable for use with the standard .NET web request APIs.
Docs.returns: A custom which uses to find a suitable proxy Uri to use.
Docs.remarks: Uses this method to initialize its property.
